title: RT News - October 07, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: Tear gas, petrol bombs and beatings - Hong Kong's pro-democracy protests take an increasingly-violent turn. Donald Trump says it's time to put a stop to America's 'ridiculous wars'. That's as the US abandons its Kurdish allies in northern Syria, withdrawing its forces ahead of an imminent Turkish offensive. Extinction Rebellion launches a two-week protest campaign - with eco-activists aiming to 'shut down' cities around the world, as they call on governments to halt the destruction of the environment. But how much support is there for the movement?
